title: Measuring Effectiveness and Improvement Strategies for Library Workshops for University Science Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience in academic resource retrieval
context.additional_context: Measuring effectiveness and learning improvement methods for short-term library workshops aimed at strengthening research competencies of undergraduate science students

learning_goals: Learners will independently search for three or more relevant resources in scientific academic databases within three days after the workshop.
Learners will achieve a satisfaction score of 4 or higher on a 5-point scale through the workshop satisfaction survey.
Learners will apply two or more information utilization skills acquired from the workshop to project-based assessments within one week.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
